22-0937.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes of the Housing Authority of the City of Long Beach, California Special Meeting heldTuesday, July 12, 2022.Page 1 of 3411 W. OCEAN BOULEVARDCIVIC CHAMBERS, 4:30 PMTUESDAY, AUGUST 9, 2022CITY OF LONG BEACHHOUSING AUTHORITY OF THE CITY OF LONG BEACH, CALIFORNIA MINUTESA motion was made by Commissioner Mungo, seconded by Commissioner Allen, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 8 - Allen, Supernaw, Mungo, Austin, Richardson, Tanzer, Saro and ZendejasAbsent: 2 - Price and Uranga2.

22-0938.summary: Recommendation to receive and file the Housing Authority Financial and Operational Performance Reports for May 2022.  (Citywide)Chair Zendejas spoke.Alison King, Deputy Executive Director/Bureau Manager, spoke.A motion was made by Commissioner Mungo, seconded by Commissioner Austin, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 8 - Allen, Supernaw, Mungo, Austin, Richardson, Tanzer, Saro and ZendejasAbsent: 2 - Price and Uranga3.
